item.title: Zammy Flamez Don't Work?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote="-Legend-, post:11, topic:191998"][quote author=openice123 link=topic=255690.msg2129423#msg2129423 date=1206258878]
theres no integer declaring what damage you have hit
still graphics are pretty much used on you
and conventions are horrible lols
[/quote]

You can’t use an integer to calculate +, -, /, etc.[/quote]

an integer is any number that isnt a decimal so yes you could
int change = 0;
change + 1;

outcome is 1 becuase the integer change is 0

Read full topic

item.title: Zammy Flamez Don't Work?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

If you knew how an operator works, then you would understand.

It says right now in yours, if magic level is equal or above 99 it will work. Then it says, else if the magic level is equal AND lower than 99 it won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Zammy Flamez Don't Work?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Really trashy done. The operators are messed up and so are a lot of other things. Try changing:

else if(playerLevel[6] <= 99)

to:

 else if(playerLevel[6] < 99)

Read full topic

item.title: Zammy Flamez Don't Work?
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

My zammy flamez doesn’t work. Here is my code for it. WHEN I USE THE SPELL IT JUST MOVES TOWARDS THE PERSON AND HITS A 0. IT DOESN"T EVEN DO AN EMOTE!

[code]if(spellID == 1192) // flames of zammy - level 99

spell
{
if(q3stage >= 0)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 99)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(4278, 25)==false)
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast

this spell.");
sendMessage("You need 25 "+getItemName(4278));
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(4278, 25)==true)
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
stillgfx(83, absY+1, absX);
stillgfx(83, absY-1, absX);
stillgfx(83, absY, absX + 1);
stillgfx(83, absY, absX - 1);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(78, castOnPlayer.absY,

castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 10;
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 25);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 99)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 99 to cast

this spell.");
}
}
else
{
sendMessage("You need to of completed Spells Of

The Gods quest to use this spell.");
}
}[/code]

many thankx if u help.

Read full topic
